issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://abinbevefes.ru/gold-mine-beer-natsionalnye/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fabinbevefes.ru%2Fgold-mine-beer-natsionalnye%2F) ### Comment > can't use site without accepting cookies Username: `@rakleed` ### Screenshots
